EmailTemplate.name: TSE-2017-10-12-Vancouver Community Appreciation Event.ES-2017-10-13 Thank You.EM
EmailTemplate.subject: Thank You For Joining Turbonomic and Cisco!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
We wanted to personally thank you for joining the Turbonomic and Cisco teams last night at Rogers Arena! We had a great time getting to know you and we hope you did too! If there is any help that we can provide to you here at Turbonomic, please do not hesitate to reach out to me directly, Pramila Nair <[[mailto:pramila.nair@turbonomic.com]]> or Jonathan Post <[[mailto:jopost@cisco.com]]> at Cisco.
On behalf of Turbonomic and Cisco - thank you!
We hope to see you again soon! Megan
Megan Gay Marketing Program Manager Turbonomic, Inc. 781-686-3634
